instruction: You are given a question on high school geography. You are also given 4 answer options (associated with "A", "B", "C", "D"), out of which only one is correct. input:
Which of the following is NOT an important environmental factor influencing a country's agriculture?
(A)Number of frost-free days per year (B)Availability of sufficient rainfall (C)Reliability of sufficient rainfall (D)Amount of fertilizer produced in the country
